From Maseru the distance is circa 140Km which can take up to 4 1/2 h if not equipped with a 4x4 drive. Most of the road is new and tar however circa 20Km is gravel. On that strech there are no petrol stations or stores/facilities.
In Thaba-Tseka there are shopping facilities, a bank, a post office, various institutions of relief organizations, and a hospital.
Stay at Mohale OA Masite Lodge based on the main road in Thaba Tseka, double from Rand 350.
